column4: It's saying a LOT of these lines: Nov 10 13:51:05 edge kernel: =54722 DPT=22 WINDOW=65535 RES=0x00 ACK URGP=0
Those are network related. Probably nothing to worry about.
Good :) But I need to have it stop logging it, because its taking valuable system resources. And a 3 day old server got 338k big /var/log/messages :S
seronis: Unfortunately, I don't know how to do that, sorry.
